name: Till Last Light (Hypnotic Owl, dr.hackenstein, Crabman)
name_original: Till Last Light (Hypnotic Owl, dr.hackenstein, Crabman)
description:
The Royal Navy has invaded your peaceful corner of the Earth. One by one, the islands around your home have been taken under British rule, and now they've come for you...

This is the big one. The first project we pumped some serious time and energy into until we realized that an epic RPG trilogy is maybe a bit much for a 3-man team. But who knows, maybe some day! Restoring the old prototype certainly didn't help quench that fire!

Until then, enjoy the opening sequence!
